channel.title: Why did I ever post something like this?

item.title: Why did I ever post something like this?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:12, topic:327620”][quote author=casey. link=topic=424007.msg3114181#msg3114181 date=1264823660]
i just laughed really hard
[/quote]

How come? Nothings really funny about this. Other than the fact that the guy who took the account make me 12m Pking =][/quote]

Told you so.

Davidi2:

Well he’s probably leveling skills or making money…

Read full topic

item.title: Why did I ever post something like this?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:9, topic:327620”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=424007.msg3114150#msg3114150 date=1264820420]

Not my fault…

Yes it is. You either didn’t choose a strong enough password or gave it to him.

It’s completely your fault either way.
[/quote]

My password is more than 10 random numbers and letters, and I never told anyone. It would have had to be a botnet. Means it not my fault.[/quote]
You were infected by a botnet. Your fault.

End of Discussion.

Read full topic
